messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, For too long Labour and the Conservatives have favoured big government, big banks and big business. UKIP will give power back to the people and allow politicians to work for the communities that elected them. It's time to stop spending so much money on foreign aid, foreign wars and foreign institutions. It's time to put our local communities first, protect vital public services and improve our NHS. A vote for UKIP is a vote for change. We believe in building a Britain that works for everyone. Yours sincerely, Ethan Wilkinson

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour an extra £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping the £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax you pay to the crown when you die.
By stopping our £30 million a day and clawing back the £350 million a week spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.health: UKIP will pour an extra £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
